channel.title: About Last Night
channel.copyright: Copyright Â© 2013 About Last Night. All rights reserved.
channel.description: Comedians Brad Williams and Adam Ray share crazy stories from their lives on the road. From sex, to sports, to booze, when a dwarf and a Jew come together the results are unpredictable but always entertaining.
channel.itunes:author: About Last Night
channel.itunes:summary: Comedians Brad Williams and Adam Ray share crazy stories from their lives on the road. From sex, to sports, to booze, when a dwarf and a Jew come together the results are unpredictable but always entertaining.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Comedians Brad Williams and Adam Ray share crazy stories from their lives on the road. From sex, to sports, to booze, when a dwarf and a Jew come together the results are unpredictable but always entertaining.

item.title: ABL - Special Announcement!
item.description: Brad announces that next Monday's episode will be broadcast LIVE! on Monday at 6 p.m. PST on cogo.tv/aboutlastnight. You can watch the podcast live, interact with Adam and Brad, and have access to special rewards!
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad announces that next Monday's episode will be broadcast LIVE! on Monday at 6 p.m. PST on cogo.tv/aboutlastnight. You can watch the podcast live, interact with Adam and Brad, and have access to special rewards!

item.title: ABL - Ron Funches
item.description: Ron Funches is the most lovable man in comedy. He's one of the sweetest, funniest, most clever people you'll meet, so it's no wonder he's slowly taking over Hollywood. With appearances on Chelsea Lately, Conan, @Midnight, and a new series on NBC coming out in May called "Undateable," he will soon be unapproachable. That's not true. That's impossible, as you'll find out in this hilarious episode, with a hilarious human being. Follow Ron on twitter @ronfunches.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ron Funches is the most lovable man in comedy. He's one of the sweetest, funniest, most clever people you'll meet, so it's no wonder he's slowly taking over Hollywood. With appearances on Chelsea Lately, Conan, @Midnight, and a new series on NBC...

item.title: ABL - Neal Brennan
item.description: He co-created the Chappelle Show, wrote Half Baked, wrote jokes for Seth Meyers to roast Obama, and has stories about Eddie Murphy that will make your jaw drop. Neal Brennan is a great dude, a prolific comedian, and a helluva a writer. It's one of our best episodes yet. Follow him on Twitter @nealbrennan.
item.itunes:subtitle: He co-created the Chappelle Show, wrote Half Baked, wrote jokes for Seth Meyers to roast Obama, and has stories about Eddie Murphy that will make your jaw drop. Neal Brennan is a great dude, a prolific comedian, and a helluva a writer. It's one of our...

item.title: ABL - Russell Peters
item.description: Russell Peters has sold out Toronto's Air Canada Center, drew the largest crowd ever for a standup show in Australia, and now he's stopping by the ABLN podcast to talk about how YouTube gave him a career boost, the difference between performing in Sri-Lanka vs. Des Monies, and meeting Jon Bon Jovi. If you're a comedy junkie, this episode is for you. Follow Russell on twitter @therealrussellp.
item.itunes:subtitle: Russell Peters has sold out Toronto's Air Canada Center, drew the largest crowd ever for a standup show in Australia, and now he's stopping by the ABLN podcast to talk about how YouTube gave him a career boost, the difference between performing in...

item.title: ABL - Bob Saget
item.description: The incredible Bob Saget stops by to talk about Full House, writing jokes for America's Funniest Home Videos, getting roasted by his friends & tells a Dave Coulier story you won't hear again. Get his new book "Dirty Daddy," and follow him on Twitter @bobsaget.
item.itunes:subtitle: The incredible Bob Saget stops by to talk about Full House, writing jokes for America's Funniest Home Videos, getting roasted by his friends & tells a Dave Coulier story you won't hear again. Get his new book "Dirty Daddy," and follow him on...

item.title: ABL - Josh Adam Meyers
item.description: With one of the best voices in the business, comedian Josh Adam Meyers stops by to tell us about his strip club DJ days, growing up the only white guy in Baltimore, and maybe the only story regarding 9/11 that will make you laugh. Follow him on Twitter @JoshAdamMeyers.
item.itunes:subtitle: With one of the best voices in the business, comedian Josh Adam Meyers stops by to tell us about his strip club DJ days, growing up the only white guy in Baltimore, and maybe the only story regarding 9/11 that will make you laugh. Follow him on...

item.title: ABL - Kevin Nealon
item.description: The one & only Kevin Nealon stops by to give us a rare glimpse into how his career came to be, getting SNL through Dana Carvey & the one sketch with Chris Farley that made him break character. Don't miss this one! And follow him on Twitter @kevin_nealon.
item.itunes:subtitle: The one & only Kevin Nealon stops by to give us a rare glimpse into how his career came to be, getting SNL through Dana Carvey & the one sketch with Chris Farley that made him break character. Don't miss this one! And follow him on Twitter...

item.title: ABL - Taylor Williamson
item.description: He was sleeping in his car two months before he won 2nd place on this past season of America's Got Talent, and now he's selling out all over the country. The adorable and hilarious Taylor Williamson stops by to talk about his teenage fans, his feud with Hedi Klum & meeting James Lipton. Follow him on twitter @taylorcomedy.
item.itunes:subtitle: He was sleeping in his car two months before he won 2nd place on this past season of America's Got Talent, and now he's selling out all over the country. The adorable and hilarious Taylor Williamson stops by to talk about his teenage fans, his feud...

item.title: ABL - Anders Holm
item.description: WORKAHOLICS star Anders "DERS" Holm, stops by to talk about going to college in Wisconsin, getting his start in LA, and how having a baby has changed his life. It's a great interview from top to bottom. Follow him on twitter @ders808
item.itunes:subtitle: WORKAHOLICS star Anders "DERS" Holm, stops by to talk about going to college in Wisconsin, getting his start in LA, and how having a baby has changed his life. It's a great interview from top to bottom. Follow him on twitter @ders808

item.title: ABL - Jonathan Kite
item.description: TWO BROKE GIRLS star Jonathan Kite returns to talk about his love for the NBA, does some amazing impressions, and prank calls a Thai restaurant as Jeff Bridges. If you want a lot of laughs, this episode is for you. Follow him on Twitter @jbkite.
item.itunes:subtitle: TWO BROKE GIRLS star Jonathan Kite returns to talk about his love for the NBA, does some amazing impressions, and prank calls a Thai restaurant as Jeff Bridges. If you want a lot of laughs, this episode is for you. Follow him on Twitter @jbkite.

item.title: ABL - Brittany Furlan
item.description: She has the most followers on VINE in the history of the world, as well as the most natural energy, and she's fucking hilarious. Comedian Brittany Furlan joins us for an episode of this podcast you won't soon forget.
item.itunes:subtitle: She has the most followers on VINE in the history of the world, as well as the most natural energy, and she's fucking hilarious. Comedian Brittany Furlan joins us for an episode of this podcast you won't soon forget.

item.title: ABL - Chris D'Elia
item.description: The one and only Chris D'Elia takes a break from being a TV star and friend of Justin Bieber, to talk about his new hour comedy special, why he thinks sports are ridiculous, and helps Adam come up with a new catchphrase. It's an incredible episode. Go see Chris live & find his tour dates at chrisdelia.com, and follow him on twitter @chrisdelia.
item.itunes:subtitle: The one and only Chris D'Elia takes a break from being a TV star and friend of Justin Bieber, to talk about his new hour comedy special, why he thinks sports are ridiculous, and helps Adam come up with a new catchphrase. It's an incredible episode. Go...

item.title: ABL - Mike Young
item.description: Hilarious comic Mike Young stops by to talk about meeting John Stamos, playing basketball with Leo Dicaprio & making his new movie "My Man is a Loser."
item.itunes:subtitle: Hilarious comic Mike Young stops by to talk about meeting John Stamos, playing basketball with Leo Dicaprio & making his new movie "My Man is a Loser."

item.title: ABL - Brad and Adam 1-27-14
item.description: Brad & Adam are going to the SUPER BOWL! Today they talk about their upcoming sports journey, how Brad almost died in Vegas from a pot cookie, and introduce the About Last Night drinking game!
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad & Adam are going to the SUPER BOWL! Today they talk about their upcoming sports journey, how Brad almost died in Vegas from a pot cookie, and introduce the About Last Night drinking game!

item.title: ABL - Jay Larson
item.description:
Comedian Jay Larson stops by to talk 90's R&B, his amazing proposal story, and Adam talks about getting drunk with the Goo Goo Dolls.

Be sure to check out Jay's amazing podcast "The Crabfeast," on ITUNES & Stitcher. Follow him on twitter @jaylarsoncomedy
item.itunes:subtitle: Comedian Jay Larson stops by to talk 90's R&B, his amazing proposal story, and Adam talks about getting drunk with the Goo Goo Dolls. Be sure to check out Jay's amazing podcast "The Crabfeast," on ITUNES & Stitcher. Follow him on twitter...

item.title: ABL - Michael McDonald
item.description: He played Stuart on MADTV, he played Adam's boss in THE HEAT, and now the hilarious Michael McDonald stops by to talk about his love for shitty reality TV, how tiny Brad is, his worst morning TV experience, and oh yea, we all get pretty drunk.
item.itunes:subtitle: He played Stuart on MADTV, he played Adam's boss in THE HEAT, and now the hilarious Michael McDonald stops by to talk about his love for shitty reality TV, how tiny Brad is, his worst morning TV experience, and oh yea, we all get pretty drunk.

item.title: ABL- Lisa Kudrow
item.description: She starred on FRIENDS, THE COMEBACK, WEB THERAPY, and now Lisa Kudrow is on the ABOUT LAST NIGHT podcast! This was an incredible episode. She tells the boys how getting fired from FRASIER helped her get FRIENDS, going from studying Science to Comedy, and working with Meryl Streep. Subscribe & rate the podcast on ITUNES!
item.itunes:subtitle: She starred on FRIENDS, THE COMEBACK, WEB THERAPY, and now Lisa Kudrow is on the ABOUT LAST NIGHT podcast! This was an incredible episode. She tells the boys how getting fired from FRASIER helped her get FRIENDS, going from studying Science to Comedy,...

item.title: ABL - Dr. Drew
item.description: Dr. Drew takes a break from hosting LOVELINE & HLN'S "ON CALL," to talk about how he got into medicine, the dangers of prescription pill addiction, his passionate stance on gun control, and being on DAWSON'S CREEK.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Drew takes a break from hosting LOVELINE & HLN'S "ON CALL," to talk about how he got into medicine, the dangers of prescription pill addiction, his passionate stance on gun control, and being on DAWSON'S CREEK.

item.title: ABL - Jaleel White
item.description:
Friend of the show, Jaleel White, stops by for his 3rd time to talk about the holidays, a midget clothing line for Brad, and helps us
make up the first ever FAMILY MATTERS drinking game!
item.itunes:subtitle: Friend of the show, Jaleel White, stops by for his 3rd time to talk about the holidays, a midget clothing line for Brad, and helps usmake up the first ever FAMILY MATTERS drinking game!

item.title: ABL - Skyler Stone
item.description: Comedian Skyler Stone stops by to talk about pranking Twilight fans, his new movie "Walking With Dinosaurs", and does a few of his incredible impressions.
item.itunes:subtitle: Comedian Skyler Stone stops by to talk about pranking Twilight fans, his new movie "Walking With Dinosaurs", and does a few of his incredible impressions.

item.title: ABL - Nate Bargatze
item.description: One of the best up and coming comics, Nate Bargatze, stops by to talk about touring with Jimmy Fallon, his father working as a clown, and how his wife almost left him after he drunkenly peed the bed.
item.itunes:subtitle: One of the best up and coming comics, Nate Bargatze, stops by to talk about touring with Jimmy Fallon, his father working as a clown, and how his wife almost left him after he drunkenly peed the bed.

item.title: ABL - Blake Anderson
item.description: WORKAHOLICS creator & star Blake Anderson stops by to tell us how the story of how the show got made, making homemade backyard wrestling videos, crazy fan stories, and how Nickelodeon influenced his life.
item.itunes:subtitle: WORKAHOLICS creator & star Blake Anderson stops by to tell us how the story of how the show got made, making homemade backyard wrestling videos, crazy fan stories, and how Nickelodeon influenced his life.

item.title: ABL - Steve Simeone
item.description: One of the best comedians in the biz, Steve Simeone, stops by to chat about his days working at The Comedy Store, how sex-education videos made him laugh as a kid, and attending the first ever taping of Double Dare.
item.itunes:subtitle: One of the best comedians in the biz, Steve Simeone, stops by to chat about his days working at The Comedy Store, how sex-education videos made him laugh as a kid, and attending the first ever taping of Double Dare.

item.title: ABL - Kirk Fox
item.description: One of the best comics in the game and host of "The Test," on CBS, KIRK FOX, stops by the podcast and tells us about playing tennis with Dr. Phil, his amazing father, and is interrupted by the boys new sponsor; Danny Glover.
item.itunes:subtitle: One of the best comics in the game and host of "The Test," on CBS, KIRK FOX, stops by the podcast and tells us about playing tennis with Dr. Phil, his amazing father, and is interrupted by the boys new sponsor; Danny Glover.

item.title: ABL - Brad & Adam 11.18
item.description: The boys are back solo this week, and discuss a new project with Urkel, Brad's role in Adam's wedding, and play an all new round of "What Will Adam Believe."
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys are back solo this week, and discuss a new project with Urkel, Brad's role in Adam's wedding, and play an all new round of "What Will Adam Believe."

item.title: ABL - Jessimae Peluso
item.description: GIRL CODE star Jessimae Peluso stops by to talk horrible pick up lines, meeting Lionel Ritchie, and her most paranoid weed story. It's a great episode from top to bottom. You'll fall in love like we did.
item.itunes:subtitle: GIRL CODE star Jessimae Peluso stops by to talk horrible pick up lines, meeting Lionel Ritchie, and her most paranoid weed story. It's a great episode from top to bottom. You'll fall in love like we did.

item.title: ABL - Ben Gigli
item.description: One of Adam's best buds from Seattle, Ben Gigli, stops by to talk about creating the web sensation "5 second Films," driving stoned to Arizona, and his hilarious elementary school days with Adam.
item.itunes:subtitle: One of Adam's best buds from Seattle, Ben Gigli, stops by to talk about creating the web sensation "5 second Films," driving stoned to Arizona, and his hilarious elementary school days with Adam.

item.title: ABL- Owen Benjamin
item.description: Owen Benjamin stops by to break down the differences between men & women, his love for The Neverending Story, & how Jimmy Fallon started his career.
item.itunes:subtitle: Owen Benjamin stops by to break down the differences between men & women, his love for The Neverending Story, & how Jimmy Fallon started his career.

item.title: ALN - Steve O.
item.description: JACKASS star Steve-O stops by to talk about being lit on fire, his new Youtube Channel, and the transition from stunt man to standup.
item.itunes:subtitle: JACKASS star Steve-O stops by to talk about being lit on fire, his new Youtube Channel, and the transition from stunt man to standup.

item.title: ABL - Jon Huck
item.description: Jon Huck stops by to talk about working on PUNKD, his new show "Oops It Slipped In," and having ball cancer.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jon Huck stops by to talk about working on PUNKD, his new show "Oops It Slipped In," and having ball cancer.

item.title: ABL - Harland Williams
item.description: The hilarious Harland Williams returns to talk about his new movie review podcast, the woman who pushed her husband off a cliff, and the boys teach him what a "queef" is.
item.itunes:subtitle: The hilarious Harland Williams returns to talk about his new movie review podcast, the woman who pushed her husband off a cliff, and the boys teach him what a "queef" is.

item.title: ABL - Joey McIntyre
item.description: Joey McIntyre from NEW KIDS ON THE BLOCK & "The Heat" stops by to talk crazy fan stories, Miley Cyrus, & sings a Boys II Men duet with Adam.
item.itunes:subtitle: Joey McIntyre from NEW KIDS ON THE BLOCK & "The Heat" stops by to talk crazy fan stories, Miley Cyrus, & sings a Boys II Men duet with Adam.

item.title: ABL - Brandon Brash
item.description: General Hospital soap star Brandon Barash stops by with a bag of whiskey and Brad gets hammered.
item.itunes:subtitle: General Hospital soap star Brandon Barash stops by with a bag of whiskey and Brad gets hammered.

item.title: ABL - Taran Killiam
item.description: SNL star Taran Killam stops by to talk being cast on MADTV at 19, the weekly grind of SNL, and makes fun of Adam's jar candles.
item.itunes:subtitle: SNL star Taran Killam stops by to talk being cast on MADTV at 19, the weekly grind of SNL, and makes fun of Adam's jar candles.

item.title: ABL - Budd Friedman
item.description: Budd Friedman is a legend. He is responsible for starting The Improv Comedy Clubs, and igniting the careers of Jay Leno, Ellen Degeneres, Adam Sandler, Larry David, Dave Chappelle, and Robin Williams. And he tells us all about it.
item.itunes:subtitle: Budd Friedman is a legend. He is responsible for starting The Improv Comedy Clubs, and igniting the careers of Jay Leno, Ellen Degeneres, Adam Sandler, Larry David, Dave Chappelle, and Robin Williams. And he tells us all about it.

item.title: ABL- Ryan Sickler
item.description: Brad and Adam welcome Crabfeaster Ryan Sickler to the podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad and Adam welcome Crabfeaster Ryan Sickler to the podcast.

item.title: ABL - Erik Griffin
item.description:
WORKAHOLICS star Erik Griffin stops by to talk about getting dumped before a show, dealing with fame, and
accusing the youth basketball team he coached of point shaving.
item.itunes:subtitle: WORKAHOLICS star Erik Griffin stops by to talk about getting dumped before a show, dealing with fame, andaccusing the youth basketball team he coached of point shaving.

item.title: ABL - Dane Cook
item.description: Dane Cook stops by to talk about going from comedy clubs to selling out Madison Square Garden, getting the call for SNL, the roughest year of his life, how ET inspired him, and creates a fake Harrison Ford movie with the guys.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dane Cook stops by to talk about going from comedy clubs to selling out Madison Square Garden, getting the call for SNL, the roughest year of his life, how ET inspired him, and creates a fake Harrison Ford movie with the guys.

item.title: ABL - Whitney Cummings
item.description: Whitney Cummings stops by to talk about her new standup tour, creating a hit TV show, how she prepares for her shows, identifying with cartoons, and what's on her "fuck mix." It's an incredible interview.
item.itunes:subtitle: Whitney Cummings stops by to talk about her new standup tour, creating a hit TV show, how she prepares for her shows, identifying with cartoons, and what's on her "fuck mix." It's an incredible interview.

item.title: ABL - Chris Porter
item.description: Brad & Adam welcome comedian Chris Porter. They discuss working at McDonalds, the plot of Air Bud 6, and Adam sleeping in Chris's bathroom.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad & Adam welcome comedian Chris Porter. They discuss working at McDonalds, the plot of Air Bud 6, and Adam sleeping in Chris's bathroom.

item.title: ABL - Brad & Adam
item.description: Brad & Adam talk girls, being on stage and irrational fears of pugs.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad & Adam talk girls, being on stage and irrational fears of pugs.

item.title: ABL - Bobby Slayton
item.description: Brad & Ray welcome "The Pitbull of Comedy"  Bobby Slayton.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad & Ray welcome "The Pitbull of Comedy"  Bobby Slayton.

item.title: ABL - Paul Feig
item.description: Paul Feig, director of BRIDESMAIDS, and the new movie THE HEAT, stops by to talk about directing The Office, Melissa McCarthy, starting standup, and Brad and Adam pitch him a dwarf musical...
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul Feig, director of BRIDESMAIDS, and the new movie THE HEAT, stops by to talk about directing The Office, Melissa McCarthy, starting standup, and Brad and Adam pitch him a dwarf musical...

item.title: ABL - Bobby Lee
item.description: Bobby Lee visits the boys to talk about bagging dwarf babes in Thailand, Grimace penises and Bobbys part in Brads career.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bobby Lee visits the boys to talk about bagging dwarf babes in Thailand, Grimace penises and Bobbys part in Brads career.

item.title: ABL - Brad & Adam
item.description: This week Brad and Adam are having a heart to heart about their relationship now that gay marriage is legal in California...pondering their marital status and wondering who would be the one wearing white.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week Brad and Adam are having a heart to heart about their relationship now that gay marriage is legal in California...pondering their marital status and wondering who would be the one wearing white.

item.title: ABL - Andrew Santino
item.description: The guys invite friend Andrew Santino to discuss how to recognize a friends "poop run" and what to do if you get Punk'd.
item.itunes:subtitle: The guys invite friend Andrew Santino to discuss how to recognize a friends "poop run" and what to do if you get Punk'd.

item.title: ABL - Iliza Shlesinger
item.description: Brad "Sexy Mustache" and Adam Ray invite Iliza Shlesinger to air her grievances with the Coffee Bean
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad "Sexy Mustache" and Adam Ray invite Iliza Shlesinger to air her grievances with the Coffee Bean

item.title: ABL - Michael Yo
item.description: The guys invite multi talented stand up Michael Yo to talk about Jewish Deli's in Houston and waxing your ass.
item.itunes:subtitle: The guys invite multi talented stand up Michael Yo to talk about Jewish Deli's in Houston and waxing your ass.

item.title: ABL - Dan Levy
item.description: Brad and Adam invite comic Dan Levy to talk about stomach acid, the death of your career and slutty mothers in Playboy.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad and Adam invite comic Dan Levy to talk about stomach acid, the death of your career and slutty mothers in Playboy.

item.title: ABL - The Cabo Episode
item.description: Brad & Ray podcasting from Cabo San Lucas. They explore the IKEA meatball, vacation Dwarf sex and the misuse of "Whatever happens in Vegas stays in Vegas".
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad & Ray podcasting from Cabo San Lucas. They explore the IKEA meatball, vacation Dwarf sex and the misuse of "Whatever happens in Vegas stays in Vegas".

item.title: ABL - Mark Serritella
item.description: Our first episode on Fake Mustache Studios!  Brad and Adam discuss dwarf feet and why Jews should have more friends who are little people with guest Mark Serritella.
item.itunes:subtitle: Our first episode on Fake Mustache Studios!  Brad and Adam discuss dwarf feet and why Jews should have more friends who are little people with guest Mark Serritella.

item.title: About Last Night 5-6-13.
item.description: Brad and Adam discuss why they have been gone, Brad encountering a fan who is scared of midgets, and Adam interviews his nieces about Justin Bieber.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad and Adam discuss why they have been gone, Brad encountering a fan who is scared of midgets, and Adam interviews his nieces about Justin Bieber.

item.title: ABL-Mark Ellis
item.description: Mark Ellis of the Schmoes Know podcast joins Brad and Adam in a bonus episode where they discuss Alf, John Stamos\' fear of dwarfs, and using Goofy as a racial slur.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark Ellis of the Schmoes Know podcast joins Brad and Adam in a bonus episode where they discuss Alf, John Stamos\' fear of dwarfs, and using Goofy as a racial slur.

item.title: About Last Night 4-15-13
item.description: Brad and Adam talk about the Justin Bieber/Ann Frank controversy, their dream line-up for a music festival, and comedian/musician Ace Guillen stops by to play Celebrity Serenades.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad and Adam talk about the Justin Bieber/Ann Frank controversy, their dream line-up for a music festival, and comedian/musician Ace Guillen stops by to play Celebrity Serenades.

item.description: Brad and Adam talk about what happened at KROQ's April Foolishness Comedy show and compare stories about school bullies.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad and Adam talk about what happened at KROQ's April Foolishness Comedy show and compare stories about school bullies.

item.description: Ari Shaffir joins the guys to talk about his new special and tries to get Brad to do Mushrooms
item.itunes:subtitle: Ari Shaffir joins the guys to talk about his new special and tries to get Brad to do Mushrooms

item.title: ABL - Adam Devine
item.description: Workaholics star Adam Devine joins the guys to talk about creating the show, his beef with Joey Fatone, and improvises his version of Vanessa Carlton's "Thousand Miles."
item.itunes:subtitle: Workaholics star Adam Devine joins the guys to talk about creating the show, his beef with Joey Fatone, and improvises his version of Vanessa Carlton's "Thousand Miles."

item.description: Brad and Adam talk about why they can\'t go into Abercrombie & Fitch stores, create a Mexican talk show, and call comedian Skyler Stone in the hospital.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad and Adam talk about why they can\'t go into Abercrombie & Fitch stores, create a Mexican talk show, and call comedian Skyler Stone in the hospital.

item.itunes:subtitle: Comedian Geoff Keith talks about writing a book about creepy guys, bad college gigs, and getting high with Brad.

item.title: ABL - Chris D'Elia
item.description: Chris D'Elia from Whitney joins Brad and Adam for some freestyle rapping and sets the record for the most 80's baseball references made in a podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris D'Elia from Whitney joins Brad and Adam for some freestyle rapping and sets the record for the most 80's baseball references made in a podcast.

item.title: About Last Night 2-25-13
item.description: Brad talks about being a suspected terrorist, Adam describes the worst gig of his life, and Joey Medina pops by for some quick laughs.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad talks about being a suspected terrorist, Adam describes the worst gig of his life, and Joey Medina pops by for some quick laughs.

item.title: About Last Night 2-19-13
item.description: Brad describes getting in a bar fight with his dwarf friend and former Major League Baseball players Robert Fick and Dmitri Young talk about the upcoming MLB season and their new podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad describes getting in a bar fight with his dwarf friend and former Major League Baseball players Robert Fick and Dmitri Young talk about the upcoming MLB season and their new podcast.

item.title: ABL - Harland Williams

item.itunes:subtitle: The great Harland Williams joins Brad and Adam. Harland shares some behind the scenes stories from filming Dumb and Dumber and his revolutionary new comedy special Harland Williams: A Force of Nature!

item.title: ABL - Jonathan Kite
item.description:
Two Broke Girls star and impressionist Jonathan Kite (Oleg) joins the guys to talk Tom Hanks and why
 Dr. Claw needs a reality show.

item.description:
Jaleel White returns! Tells stories about Eddie Winslow taking him on his first date and Adam surprises him with a 
rendition of the Family Matters theme song. Watch his show Total Blackout on SyFy channel!
item.itunes:subtitle: Jaleel White returns! Tells stories about Eddie Winslow taking him on his first date and Adam surprises him with a rendition of the Family Matters theme song. Watch his show Total Blackout on SyFy channel!

item.description: Brad and Adam describe their bromance weekend and their latest viral video.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brad and Adam describe their bromance weekend and their latest viral video.

item.itunes:subtitle: Melissa Villasenor stops by to share some of her incredible impressions and talk about her night at a club with Brad and Adam

item.title: About Last Night 12-3-12
item.description: Brad and Adam discuss This Week In 12 Year Old Girl News and declare war on Randy Newman
